item.title: Case Help and Ban commands
item.dc:creator: @Get_Forgotten Get_Forgotten
item.description:
@Get_Forgotten wrote:

I need to get my case to teleport… its a ship plank and its not working… and also a portal isnt working… idk what i fucked up on O-o

these are the two cases

[code]case 11211:
teleportToX = 2853;
teleportToY = 3238;
sendMessage(“your boat crashes and you narrowly escape with your life!”);
sendMessage(“use portal at the top of the mountian to go home”);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
break;

case 2465:
if(actionTimer == 0) {

sendMessage(“Use the lever to the south to leave”);
teleportToX = 3689;
teleportToY = 2965;
actionTimer = 7;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;[/code]

and i’ve tried several ban commands but none seem to work

Read full topic
